section.section:
By December 31, 1991, the Department, after consulting with local government and the real estate development, building, and environmental communities, shall adopt regulations, including the development of guidance manuals to:
Implement this subtitle and set requirements and standards which establish:
Assist and guide local authorities in the development of their local forest conservation program by providing:
Assist developers, planners, surveyors, engineers, foresters, biologists, and landscape architects in:
All provisions of the guidance manual that are not specifically noted as standards or minimum requirements shall be deemed recommendations by the Department for the development of the local program.

text.section:
By December 31, 1992, the Department shall prepare and provide to local authorities a statewide forest resource inventory that shall:
Be updated every 5 years or as deemed appropriate by the Department; and
Include a list of potential sites for reforestation or afforestation of both publicly and privately owned land on a county by county basis.
